info.title: CinePrime
info.description: CinePrime is a movie booking platform that allows users to book movies and watch them in the cinema.

post.description: Authenticate a user by their email and password. Returns a JWT token upon successful authentication.
Register a new user with their email, username, password, and isAdmin status. Returns a JWT token upon successful registration.
